nodes.text: Brass was a metal that could notably be used in the construction of lightsabers. For example, Agen Kolar's weapon was made of brass and durasteel. Brass could also be combined with manganese to create an alloy. Part of the bar pipework at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina was also made of brass. The yacht of Arsin Crassus had brass and carmine piping.
